name: ecomerce
description: E-commerce application with Angular frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.start: echo 'Starting frontend on http://localhost:4200' && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.start:backend: echo 'Starting backend on http://localhost:8080' && cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8080
scripts.dev: echo 'Use two separate terminals to run both commands: npm run start and npm run start:backend'
